Metadata.title: Heart of Fantasy | A permadeath MMORPG
Metadata.description: "Heart of Fantasy" is a survival MMORPG with permadeath and a procedurally generated world featuring oceans, rivers, and mountains.

HistorySection.title: About the game
HistorySection.description:
Heart of Fantasy is an MMORPG unlike anything you've ever experienced. In this persistent and cyclical world, darkness plays with the hearts of players. The Demon King is immortal, not by power, but by emptiness: he divided his heart into fragments and gave them to the darkness.
As long as these fragments are scattered across the world, he cannot die. Only those who gather them all can break his immortality and challenge him in a final battle. And if they defeat him, they must make a choice: destroy the cycle and begin an era of peace for all, or divide their own heart and surrender it to the darkness, becoming the new Demon King.
